values: Is Jesus an Egomaniac? Overcoming a Major Obstacle to Christian FaithIs Jesus an Egomaniac? Overcoming a Major Obstacle to Christian Faith

What do we call an obsessively self-centered person? An egomaniac. Then what should we call God, who demands all our praise? We call him gracious.What do we call an obsessively self-centered person? An egomaniac. Then what should we call God, who demands all our praise? We call him gracious.
